title: Houlihan Lokey's Russo on Impact of Streaming at US Open(Audio)
itunes:title: Houlihan Lokey's Russo on Impact of Streaming at US Open(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Chris Russo, Managing Director in the Tech/Media/ Telecom Group at Houlihan Lokey and expert in digital sports media, on the business of the US Open, and impact of technology on tennis. Live from the 2016 US Tennis Open.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
